originalText.text: Sach and his team are excellent! I asked them to move an obsolete baby grand out of our apartment, and a new one in. It involved complicated scheduling and physical logistics, but they were pleasant and highly competent at every juncture. The moves were completed without a hitch. I wouldn’t hesitate to hire Sach and his team for any moving requirement, including valuables and difficult jobs.

originalText.text: Where to start. I cannot say enough positive things. These guys moved my things across the country. They were extremely efficient. They were extremely responsive. They took video in different states to tell me where they were. They showed up on time every time from the appointment to get the quote to the day of the move to the day the move was completed. They answered any and all questions. On the day the move was completed, they helped me assemble my bed, table, and more. Well worth the cost of the move! They respected my home and everything I moved like it was their own with a massive amount of respect. Nothing got broken, scratched, dinged, or damaged. If you need something moved, definitely go with these guys!

originalText.text: We moved within New York in October 2023, from a two-bedroom apartment to a three-bedroom apartment. We had an excellent experience. First, Sach himself came to inspect our place and provide an estimate. (Moving is expensive, but we thought the price was fair, given the amount of work involved.) The day before the move, four people came to pack our items, which took several hours. The day of the move, the same four people came, and spent over 10 hours moving our boxes and furniture. They were careful, helpful, and friendly throughout the entire experience. We were very happy.

originalText.text: Great moving service. They were able to put me on their schedule on a very short notice. I had a very small move just needing 1 person, Christian, and he was on time, called ahead, and nothing was damaged. Made sure the cover on my bed was extra secure. The worker in the van was also very kind.

originalText.text: Sach's movers were great! Just moved us from Washington heights to Ohio. They did a full pack for us, took apart and reassembled our beds, super nice guys, highly recommend using them.
